actionConfiguration.body:
UPDATE APS_CUSTOMER_ENTITY_PERSON_DETAILS
  SET   CUSTOMER_KEY_PERSON_ENTITY_TYPE = {{'Auth Signatory Person India'}},
CUSTOMER_KEY_PERSON_TYPE  = {{''}},
CUSTOMER_KEY_PERSON_IS_AUTH_SIGN = {{true}},
CUSTOMER_KEY_PERSON_OTHERS_INFO = {{''}},
CUSTOMER_KEY_PERSON_PARTNER_PERC = {{Number(0).toString()}},
CUSTOMER_KEY_PERSON_FIRSTNAME = {{Input1.text}},
CUSTOMER_KEY_PERSON_MIDDLENAME = {{Input3.text}},
CUSTOMER_KEY_PERSON_LASTNAME = {{Input4.text}},
CUSTOMER_KEY_PERSON_MOTHERNAME  = {{Input5.text}},
CUSTOMER_KEY_PERSON_FATHERNAME = {{Input6.text}},
CUSTOMER_KEY_PERSON_DOB = {{moment(DatePicker1).format("YYYY-MM-DD")}},
CUSTOMER_KEY_PERSON_TAX_ID  = {{Input7.text}},
CUSTOMER_KEY_PERSON_NATIONALITY = {{Select3.selectedOptionValue}},
CUSTOMER_KEY_PERSON_RES_TAX_PURPOSE = {{Select4.selectedOptionValue}},
CUSTOMER_KEY_PERSON_DESIGNATION  = {{''}},
CUSTOMER_KEY_PERSON_PASSPORT_NO = {{Input19.text}},
CUSTOMER_KEY_PERSON_PASSPORT_EXPIRE_DATE = {{moment(DatePicker1).format("YYYY-MM-DD")}},
CUSTOMER_KEY_PERSON_ACCESS_AS = {{vayAuthSignatoryUserAccess.selectedOptionValue}},
CUSTOMER_KEY_PERSON_DIN_DPIN  = {{Input8.text}},
CUSTOMER_KEY_PERSON_ADDRESS_LINE1  = {{Input9.text}},
CUSTOMER_KEY_PERSON_ADDRESS_LINE2  = {{Input10.text}},
CUSTOMER_KEY_PERSON_ADDRESS_CITY  = {{Input11.text}},
CUSTOMER_KEY_PERSON_ADDRESS_DISTRICT  = {{Input12.text}},
CUSTOMER_KEY_PERSON_ADDRESS_STATE  = {{Input13.text}},
CUSTOMER_KEY_PERSON_ADDRESS_COUNTRY = {{vayIndAuthSignAddCountrySelect.selectedOptionValue}},
CUSTOMER_KEY_PERSON_ADDRESS_ZIP = {{Input15.text}},
CUSTOMER_KEY_PERSON_MOBILE  = {{Input16.text}},
CUSTOMER_KEY_PERSON_EMAIL   = {{Input17.text}}
WHERE OID = {{appsmith.store.editKeyPersonOID}}
AND CUSTOMER_OID = {{ appsmith.store.customerOID }}
AND CUSTOMER_KEY_PERSON_ENTITY_TYPE = {{'Auth Signatory Person India'}}
